name: Little Goody Two Shoes
summary:
Little Goody Two Shoes is an tactical narrative RPG that tells the story of Elise, an ambitious girl stuck in a village too small for her big dreams. In this village of Kieferberg you’ll have to work toward your main goal - hiding an innocent witch from the merciless villagers.

Lies, deception, strategic choices and treachery! In this bizarre fairy tale all choices matter in order to protect your reputation and get what you truly desire.

All means justify the end, or do they?
